Submodules¶

qiskit_aqua.components.variational_forms.ry module¶

class qiskit_aqua.components.variational_forms.ry.RY(num_qubits, depth=3, entangler_map=None, entanglement='full', initial_state=None)[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.components.variational_forms.variational_form.VariationalForm

Layers of Y rotations followed by entangling gates.

CONFIGURATION = {'description': 'RY Variational Form', 'input_schema': {'$schema': 'http://json-schema.org/schema#', 'id': 'ry_schema', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'depth': {'type': 'integer', 'default': 3, 'minimum': 1}, 'entanglement': {'type': 'string', 'default': 'full', 'oneOf': [{'enum': ['full', 'linear']}]}, 'entangler_map': {'type': ['object', 'null'], 'default': None}}, 'additionalProperties': False}, 'name': 'RY'}¶
__init__(num_qubits, depth=3, entangler_map=None, entanglement='full', initial_state=None)[source]¶

Constructor.

Parameters:
  • num_qubits (int) – number of qubits
  • depth (int) – number of rotation layers
  • entangler_map (dict) – dictionary of entangling gates, in the format { source : [list of targets] }, or None for full entanglement.
  • entanglement (str) – ‘full’ or ‘linear’
  • initial_state (InitialState) – an initial state object
static check_pluggable_valid()¶

Checks if pluggable is ready for use. Throws an exception if not

configuration¶

Return pluggable configuration.

construct_circuit(parameters, q=None)[source]¶

Construct the variational form, given its parameters.

Parameters:
  • parameters (numpy.ndarray) – circuit parameters.
  • q (QuantumRegister) – Quantum Register for the circuit.
Returns:

a quantum circuit with given parameters
Return type:

QuantumCircuit
Raises:

ValueError – the number of parameters is incorrect.
static get_entangler_map(map_type, num_qubits)¶
classmethod init_params(params)¶
num_parameters¶

Number of parameters of the variational form.

Returns:An integer indicating the number of parameters.
parameter_bounds¶

Parameter bounds.

Returns:A list of pairs indicating the bounds, as (lower, upper). None indicates an unbounded parameter in the corresponding direction. If None is returned, problem is fully unbounded.
preferred_init_points¶
setting¶
validate(args_dict)¶
static validate_entangler_map(entangler_map, num_qubits)¶

qiskit_aqua.components.variational_forms.variational_form module¶

This module contains the definition of a base class for variational forms. Several types of commonly used ansatz.

class qiskit_aqua.components.variational_forms.variational_form.VariationalForm[source]¶

Bases: qiskit_aqua.pluggable.Pluggable

Base class for VariationalForms.

This method should initialize the module and its configuration, and use an exception if a component of the module is available.

Parameters:configuration (dict) – configuration dictionary
